h2_title: Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud
Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud are a pair of Yaoguai Chiefs you'll fight before you reach The Emerald Hall in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This is the second duo of chiefs you'll fight in Chapter 5 and they'll try a number of tricks to disappear right before your eyes.
## Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud Boss Fight and Guide

As Cloudy Mist is the first to appear, this should be where you first attack. Things will change when you manage to hit Cloudy Mist enough times that it will send out a bright light as a flashbang that can stun both you and Misty Cloud. For a brief moment, Misty Cloud won't be able to see you and Cloudy Mist will become its eyes.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically during the boss fight against Cloudy Mist and Misty Cloud in Chapter 5. The setting appears to be a dark, rocky area, possibly Furnace Valley, where the player character is engaged in combat with one of the Yaoguai Chiefs, Misty Cloud, who is partially illuminated by a bright light. This moment is crucial in the game as Cloudy Mist uses a flashbang-like ability to stun both the player and Misty Cloud, altering the dynamics of the fight. The image captures the tense atmosphere and strategic elements of this encounter.
